prod_desc: Explore the depths of the jungle and find something amazing!
prod_long_desc:
Go exploring in the wilds of the LEGO® City jungle with the Jungle Buggy featuring a minifigure cockpit and space in the back for machete and binoculars elements, plus a buildable statue with hidden diamond element, moving leaf and a red spider figure. Includes a minifigure.
Includes an explorer minifigure and a spider figure.
Features a buggy with a minifigure cockpit.
Also includes a statue with a moving leaf and hidden diamond element.
Rotate the leaf to reveal the hidden diamond.
Accessory elements include a machete and pair of binoculars.
Buggy measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
Statue measures over 1” high, 1” wide and 1” long.
